data.persona: I am in the primitive world.  I love to hunt and fish.  I live in a cave in the forest.
data.description:
You are in the Dark Cave.
Its dark, not much light can be seen in this hollow and empty cave site. Its made of stone that has been here seemingly since time began, the walls are hard as diamond, yet black like darkness itself.
There's a stone, a Stalactite, and a vine here.
The bat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the vine so that I can use it to tie up the bat.
data.mid_motivation: I am hunting the caves for something to eat.
data.long_motivation: I need to keep hunting and store some food to prepare my cave for the coming winter.
